rows.label: qev051001_MSG0001
rows.name:
RRRAAAGH! NO! This lump of scrap is not the manner
of blade I seek to make! Where am I going wrong?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0002
rows.name:
Is it my skill that is lacking? The quality of my steel?
Or is it perhaps the fault of my fool apprentice!
...Well? What say you, Gi Nagri?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0003
rows.name: What? M-me, sir...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0004
rows.name:
If it IS you, I shall not hesitate to remedy the situation.
Stand still, boy! Even this failed blade should be more
than enough to cleave a flimsy thing like you in twain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0005
rows.name: M-Master, please! You must try to calm down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0006
rows.name:
I have pounded steel for years in search of a blade
keen as a razor and adamantine in strength.
This marks my 10 thousandth attempt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0007
rows.name:
You cannot expect me to look upon 10,000 steel
corpses—lifeless despite me pouring my very soul
into every last one of them—and remain CALM![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0008
rows.name:
You there! Human! Were you in my circumstances,
you would also be crazed with rage, would you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_JNK0010
rows.name: Engage

rows.label: qev051001_SEL0011
rows.name: Talk to the interesting Wrothian.

rows.label: qev051001_JNK0020
rows.name: Avoid

rows.label: qev051001_SEL0021
rows.name: Keep your distance from the loose-cannon swordsmith.

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have seen that look before. No need to say it,
human. I understand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Gi Nagri here approached me with similar adulation
the day I took him in as an apprentice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0011
rows.name:
It seems we geniuses draw people to us merely by
existing. My every drawn breath is a spectacle!
It is a heavy thing to bear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0012
rows.name:
The smithy's fire that burns within me is enough to
frighten even my fellow Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0013
rows.name:
It is wholly understandable that you should fear me.
And be speechless and awestruck. ...And envious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0014
rows.name:
But so be it! I shall allow you to aid me in achieving
my grand dream![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0015
rows.name:
I have spent these 40 years hammering steel in search
of an unbreakable sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0016
rows.name:
A blade that would not melt if plunged in magma,
nor shatter if struck broadside by a shooting star.
As yet, it exists only in the visions of my mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0017
rows.name:
But just think of such a thing existing in waking life!
Is it not enough to set your heart to pounding?
To make your spirit sing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0018
rows.name:
Now, come! Take my hand, and let us forge this fated
blade together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0019
rows.name:
And on the glorious day when the sword is born into
this world, you shall be rewarded handsomely.
For my word is solid as my steel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0020
rows.name:
Wonderful! From this moment forth, you are my anvil
and my hammer. You shall assist me body, heart,
and soul.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0021
rows.name:
You will begin by asking the Ma-non blacksmith
Neraph what the hardest metal on Mira is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0022
rows.name:
She is learned, but meek. My overwhelming presence
terrifies her. Attempts to visit her have always ended
in her running away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0023
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! BUT! If an exceptionally average sort such
as you were to approach her, she is certain to receive
you with open, scrawny arms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0030
rows.name:
Neraph armors Skells. She is certain to know of Mira's
hardest steel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0031
rows.name:
She ought to be hiding in the shadows around here
somewhere—use any means necessary to extract this
information![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0032
rows.name: Gi Nagri! Your smithing lacks passion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0033
rows.name:
When you hammer a blade, you should be pounding
the sum of your life's experience into the steel![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0034
rows.name:
A flimsy resolve makes flimsy steel, boy.
Put the weight of your past behind each swing!
Unleash the full brunt of your pain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0035
rows.name:
Y-yes, sir! I was wrong, sir!
I will try to be better at life in general, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0036
rows.name: Yes. Good. Be better at life![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0037
rows.name:
...Hmm? What are you doing just standing there?
Have you also come to learn the art of the swordsmith?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev051001_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod with your eyes sparkling eagerly.

rows.label: qev051001_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev051001_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell De Zing that you brought information
on hypersteel from Neraph.

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0038
rows.name: Good! I knew you had the spark within you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0039
rows.name:
But these skills are trade secrets. You will have to earn
them through hard work and commitment![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0040
rows.name:
...What is that? You learned how to smelt hypersteel
from Neraph?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0041
rows.name:
Heh. Come now, human. No need to be shy.
The truth will set you free![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0042
rows.name:
Though I understand my raw genius inspires jealousy in
most. It is only natural you should reject me to preserve
your own fragile pride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0043
rows.name:
Well, no matter. Let us hear the secret of smelting
hypersteel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0044
rows.name:
Hmm, yes... Yes, I see. Cimmerian cinnabar and
zagyrin cragstone. A fascinating alloy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0045
rows.name:
Ha! Yes, I can see it now. Their properties together
would yield a blade that could cut through anything
without breaking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0046
rows.name:
Good, [ST:playername ]! Next, you will need
to procure those materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0047
rows.name:
In the meantime, I shall be here meditating on the half
a lifetime I have poured into smithing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0048
rows.name:
I must be prepared to put my all into this steel once it
is ready. Even for a genius, this is no mean feat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0049
rows.name:
I have spent some 40 years searching with singular
focus for the perfect sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0050
rows.name:
Cimmerian cinnabar and zagyrin cragstone, [ST:gender p1=man! p2=woman! ]
Once you have brought them here, I will see my dream
realized by my own two hands![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0051
rows.name: ...So you have come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0052
rows.name:
Hmm... After plumbing the depths of my smithing soul,
I have reached the razor's edge of enlightenment.
Bring me those materials. My hammer is ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0053
rows.name:
The unbreakable blade has ever eluded me,
as if it were shrouded in a dense mist.
But now, I have glimpsed its true form![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0054
rows.name:
This shall be a masterwork half a lifetime in the
making. I will forge the perfect sword in the fire
of my passion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev051001_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask to know more about De Zing's passion.

rows.label: qev051001_JNK0060
rows.name: Demand

rows.label: qev051001_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell De Zing that it's time you were paid for your work.

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0055
rows.name:
Curious, eh? Well, you have done much to help me.
I suppose you have earned that much...
Very well! I shall tell you—as a special treat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0056
rows.name: I am driven by a motive complex in its simplicity...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0057
rows.name:
I think swords are AWESOME! Especially when
people fight with two at once. That is the best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0058
rows.name:
So I will need to make a second unbreakable sword in
the fullness of time. Then I can start thinking up special
moves and what to call them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0059
rows.name:
...What? Why that look? Surely you do not mean to
make light of the passion that has driven a 40-year
career?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0060
rows.name:
...No? You just want to be paid already?
Hmm... Well, I suppose that was the bargain.
Fair enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0061
rows.name:
Hmm... Well, I suppose that was the bargain.
Fair enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0062
rows.name:
The only problem is that I am utterly broke. I have been
more or less a hermit all these years. Swordsmithing is
more a personal quest than a solvent business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0063
rows.name:
But that is not to say I deceived you. As soon as I have
made the unbreakable sword, I will be unstoppable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0064
rows.name:
All the beasts of Cauldros will fall before me!
I will earn enough to pay you in no time at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0065
rows.name:
So! Gi Nagri, prepare the forge at once!
There is work to be done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0066
rows.name:
Yes, sir! At long last, we will give physical form to
your dream![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0067
rows.name:
The unbreakable blade... We embark on the creation of
the awesomest sword ever forged![ST:wait ]
